<Link id="l05049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="5049"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// BasicBlock (and entire body of the Function) the BlockAddress refers</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l05050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="5050"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// to may have been moved. In the case that the user of BitcodeReader</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l05051" /><CodeLine lineNumber="5051"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// decides ultimately not to link the Function body, materializing here</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l05052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="5052"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// could be considered wasteful, but it&#39;s better than a deserialization</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
